remarks.format: ## Remarks 向量運算受限於支援單一指令、 多重資料 (SIMD) 指令的系統上的硬體加速，RyiJIT-just-in-time 編譯器來編譯 managed 程式碼。Vector operations are subject to hardware acceleration on systems that support Single Instruction, Multiple Data (SIMD) instructions and the RyiJIT just-in-time compiler is used to compile managed code.
